title: (x) NSGA logo slab serif - City, URW Egyptienne {Erik S, Florian}
content:
What slab serif is this? It looks like an egytienne or serifa light, but I am not certain.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033000im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/nsga_4372.jpg)

 [‹ (x) serif font w/ mixed lower and upper case - Filosofia Unicase {J Edward Sanchez}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033000/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40782 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) casual handwritten script - Brisa {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033000/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40768 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Capnhud

comments.content: And the line below looks like [URW Egyptienne](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033000/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/egyptienne/).

The logo is city... and I think your right about Egytienne!

(damn it!!! - Florian your always two seconds ahead!)

Sorry, Robert – not on purpose! ;°)  
54 minutes? That’s ridiculously lame! You can count yourself lucky that Jan, Angel or Akira aren’t around, they are the ones with real cyberspeed witchcraft.  
Here’s a [link for City](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033000/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/square-slabserif-711/).
Yeah its so hard to get a casual id to break up your thesis!

You guys are wonderful. Thanks for confirming so quickly :)

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
